results.title: Metformin Use and Severe Dengue in Diabetic Adults
results.text_hl: There were 39 (29.8%) of @<m>DISEASE_Severe_Dengue</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019595 @@@DHF@@@/@<m>DISEASE_Severe_Dengue</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019595 @@@DSS@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ among @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users and use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ had no statistically significant association with @DISEASE_Dengue @DISEASE_MESH:D003715 @@@dengue@@@ severity based on WHO 1997 classification even after adjustment of potential confounders (aRR = 0.91, 95% CI: 0.55-1.52, P = 0.73).
